__e: Right. Look, aside from Gideon, the school is a great thing, right?
Well, Gideon's still out there, and even though I defeated him once, we don't really know what he's up to, and I don't feel like I can focus on anything else until I've really dealt with that.
Gideon has been here a matter of days, and look at all the destruction he's caused.
Funny, that's not what Gideon told me.
However, Gideon has visited six of the 12 time travellers in the past and taken their blood for the new chronograph.
Gideon has given me enough trouble for one day.
I'm here, Captain, and if I could take a moment to add how wonderful it feels to be back together.
Gideon, I need to ask a big, serious favor.
You will do as I tell you, Gideon, I'm your captain!
